fullplot: Set in the 16th century AD, the movie brings to life the tale of the doomed love affair between the Mughal Crown Prince Saleem and the beautiful, ill-fated court dancer, whose fervor and intensity perpetrates a war between the prince and his father the great Mughal Emperor Akbar, and threatens to bring an empire to its knees.
plot: Inspired by true events, a 16th century prince falls in love with a court dancer and battles with his emperor father.
title: Mughal-E-Azam
